descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1229.photobucket.com/albums/ee471/edwardvlad/s_enhanced.jpg[/img]

First of all sorry for my english.

This is my third mod, and I\'ll finish this once the CK is out.

So, briefly, Stormcloaks are my favourite faction in the game, and this mod gives them a more epic look, adding heavy armor pauldrons, scalemail armor, chainmail parts etc.

I finished only male version. I\'ll do female one when I\'ll have more time. (I\'m not a male chauvinist, I just... do that first because I play as a male. So please don\'t kill me.)

Installation:
Copy the Data folder to your \"C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\" folder.

[b]Important[/b]: I\'m also looking for someone good in modelling for when the CK will come out. So please, if you are good in modelling and if you are interested in collaborate with me, please contact me!!!
author: edwardvlad
